definition[0]: the process of making something look bigger than it is
example[0]: When viewed at high magnification, it is clear that the crystals are quite different.
example[2]: The colour is evident even under low magnification.
definition[1]: the degree to which something is able to make things look bigger
example[3]: binoculars with a magnification of x12 (=which make things look 12 times as big)
